APMSRB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 185 Medical Officer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 14:51 IST
 Medical and Health Services Recruitment Board
 185 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Andhra Pradesh |  Salary : 61,960 to 140,000




FOLLOW

The Andhra Pradesh Medical Services Recruitment Board (APMSRB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 185 General Physician, Gynecologists, Pediatricians, and Medical Officers Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, MBBS, and Post-graduation can apply for the APMSRB Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Andhra Pradesh.

APMSRB Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
General Physician	13	MBBS, Post-graduation, Diploma
GynecologistMBBS	03
Pediatrician	14
Medical Officer	155	MBBS

APMSRB Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 42 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For EWS/SC/ST/BC candidates: 05 Years.
For PH candidates: 10 Years.

APMSRB Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Merit List.
Interview.

APMSRB Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For OC candidates: Rs. 1000/-.
For BC, SC/ST/EWS candidates: Rs. 750/-.

APMSRB Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 61,960/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,40,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the APMSRB Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the APMSRB Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	25-08-2025
Closing date	10-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
